alert.note: Alert for Coconino (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 31 at 7:49PM MST until August 01 at 3:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of north central Arizona, including the following county, Coconino. * WHEN...Until 600 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of the Moenkopi Wash is occurring. Water levels are expected to remain steady then begin to fall in the late evening or early morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 743 PM MST, Radar indicated Heavy rainfall on Saturday which flowed into the Moenkopi Wash. Flooding is ongoing near Tuba City on the Moenkopi Wash with flooding of farmland reported in the area. - This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Moenkopi Wash. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Tuba City, Moenkopi and Navajo Reservation. - This includes the following highways... Highway 160 between mile markers 315 and 326. State Route 264 between mile markers 322 and 325. - Visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for more information on flood safety.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
